---
title: "Map of the World, with a Pop-up indicating the location of the city Lagos on the map."
author: "PlayerUnknown"
date: "2024-09-05"
output: html_document
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
lng = 6.4541
lat = 3.3947

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>% setView(lng, lat, 3) %>%
  addPopups(lng, lat, popup = 'Lagos')
```
